analysis.key_quote: I strongly object to the proposed Schedule Policy/Career (Schedule P/C) rule as it pertains to its application to employees of the Social Security Administration (SSA).
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, citing legal concerns and the potential negative impact on civil service protections and the effectiveness of the Social Security Administration. It emphasizes the importance of merit-based systems and due process, which align with opposition to the rule.
